document.discussion_title: Quiz: How Big of a Fancilier Are You? | Quiz
document.topic_text: Oh My Disney Contributor Who doesn’t enjoy watching the Shadow Man? Dr. Facilier, the voodoo trickster from New Orleans, has everything Disney Villain fans love: magic, a delightfully evil song, and a mysterious, charismatic personality. But loving Dr. Facilier isn’t enough—do you know this villain enough to be called a Fancilier ? There’s only one way to find out: Dr. Facilier claims to be a royal on His mother's side
